title: Outgoing smtp details being teset
content:
snowski Sep 1, 2024, 18:50 CST

Emails were blocked from being sent out of Thunderbird. The solution was to change the smtp Outgoing settings, which works but only once: Telstra (email provider) recently upgraded it's security and the Outgoing Server details needed changing to "smtp.telstra.com" with Port 465, SSL/TLS, Normal Password, user name. The old default Outgoing Server was smtp.bigpond.com etc.

I deleted all the old Outgoing Server details and changed the old "smtp.bigpond.com" to "smtp.telstra.com" etc as the default. All was fine, emails could now be sent. The problem is that when Thunderbird is closed and reopened all the old smtp settings are being restored and the new SMTP settings removed/deleted. Emails now can't be sent again until the smtp settings are changed back to smtp.telstra.com etc. I've tried the advanced option and removed old smtp settings but that didn't work. Each time Thunderbird is closed the new Outgoing SMTP settings are overwritten by the old values. Is there somewhere on the C drive that I can access to delete the old settings manually or some other solution?
creator: snowski

title: Setting local network server mail folder as Local Directory
content:
I have used Thunderbird as my preferred mail client for many years. Recent upgrade to Kubuntu 24.04 from 22.04.4 seems to have changed storage options. Thunderbird 128.1.0esr(64bit)

I store my mail on my local server so that I can access it from a number of different computers on the same network. If I set the Local Directory to that network folder it is changed to /run/user/1000/doc/5f5f8977/mail.xxxxxx.com and the mail is imported to my local disk in that folder.

However, when I restart the computer I have to set up the network folder again each time.

I have never had this problem before. How do I set the Local Directory permanently to the network server address? Thanks Bob
creator: r.i.p1987

title: contenuti delle mail scomparsi - urgente
content: Buongiorno oggi non riusciamo più a vedere i contenuti delle mail in arrivo ma solo l'elenco. Abbiamo provveduto a selezionare la funzione "ripara cartella" da "proprietà cartella" della posta in arrivo. A quel punto sono scomparse tutte le mail del 2022-2023-2024 . Nell'elenco compaiono solo le mail dal 2021 in giù. Siamo disperati perchè di trattava di mail di lavoro anche certificate di due indirizzi mail. Per cortesia aiutateci a risolvere il problema. Grazie Maurizio Callegari
creator: archimaury

title: Thunderbird login problem - 0x80004005 error message
content: Hello. One e-mail account (online.de) in my Windows Mail, which has been operating continuously for three years, indicated a login password problem overnight last week. Since my mailbox was flawless on the web interface, I downloaded Thunderbirds. (I really like it so far). I logged into my two mailboxes (gmail, freemail) without any problems - but online.de also said after every setting: "Component returned failure code: 0x80004005 (NS_ERROR_FAILURE)" I tried to ask for help from the service provider for days, before they finally solved it their hands: they have no idea. In summary: online.de's web interface is flawless, Thunderbird's IMAP settings are fine, Thunderbird's other mailboxes are flawless. Can you help me what's going on???
creator: durkoandras

title: Problemas ao colar imagem do whatsapp no corpo do email - Thunderbird
content:
Bom dia.

Recentemente nem eu nem nenhum dos usuários da empresa está conseguindo colar imagens copiadas do Whatsapp Web no corpo do email utilizando o Thunderbird, versão 128.1.1esr. Até semana passada isto era possível e utilizado amplamente dentro da empresa.

Sempre que uma imagem copiada do Whatsapp web é colada no corpo do email, é exibido um ícone como se o arquivo estivesse corrompido, em anexo um exemplo. O problema ocorre utilizando as 3 opções de colagem, "Colar", "Colar sem formatação" e "Colar como citação". Adicionalmente, imagens copiadas de outras fontes na internet, como por exemplo imagens do google ou imagens copiadas de quaisquer outros sites funcionam normalmente, bem como capturas de telas tiradas do computador, sendo inseridas no corpo do email ao utilizar a opção Colar (ctrl-v).

Apesar de parece pequeno, esse problema atrapalha muito o fluxo produtivo de todos da empresa, gostaria de ajuda para entender e solucionar esse incidente.

Desde já, agradeço a todos que colaborarem.
creator: TI_Movemax
